entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Owen Sound
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:56 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this morning and early this afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 60 this morning. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 30 this morning and minus 11 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023
